mapper.select: SELECT code, name FROM product_category order by code;

WITH RECURSIVE t3 (code, name, parent, `depth`, `order`) AS ( SELECT t1.code, t1.name, t1.parent, t1.depth, t1.order FROM product_sub_category t1 WHERE t1.product_category_id = #{code} and t1.parent is null UNION ALL SELECT t2.code, t2.name, t2.parent, t2.depth, t2.order FROM product_sub_category t2 INNER JOIN t3 ON t2.parent = t3.code ) SELECT code, name, parent, `depth` FROM t3 where t3.parent is not null order BY t3.code, t3.order;
